## 🖌️ Editable Canva Templates

🎨 Use these editable templates to customize flyers, postcards, and social media posts directly in Canva.  
Just click → Canva will copy the template into your account → edit text, images, colors, and export.

- 🏠 [Open House Flyer Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)  
- 📬 [Just Listed Postcard Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)  
- 📱 [Instagram Post Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)

## 📖 How to Use

1️⃣ **Editable Canva Templates:**  
Click the Canva link → edit directly in Canva → export to PDF or PNG for print or social media.

2️⃣ **PNG Previews:**  
Click to view or download → use in your marketing materials or social content.

3️⃣ **More templates coming soon — stay tuned!**

---
```{=html}
<div class="template-container" style="max-width: 500px; margin: 30px auto; padding: 25px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 10px; background: #f9f9f9;">

  <p class="template-message" style="text-align: center; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold;">
    Have a template idea?
  </p>

  <form name="template-suggestion" method="POST" data-netlify="true" netlify-honeypot="bot-field" action="/success.html">
    <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="template-suggestion" />

    <!-- Honeypot (spam trap) -->
    <p style="display: none;">
      <label>Don’t fill this out: <input name="bot-field" /></label>
    </p>

    <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
      <label for="name">Your Name:</label><br>
      <input type="text" name="name" id="name" required style="width: 100%; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #aaa; border-radius: 5px;">
    </div>

    <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
      <label for="email">Your Email:</label><br>
      <input type="email" name="email" id="email" required style="width: 100%; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #aaa; border-radius: 5px;">
    </div>

    <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
      <label for="suggestion">Your Template Idea:</label><br>
      <textarea name="suggestion" id="suggestion" rows="4" required
        style="width: 100%; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #aaa; border-radius: 5px;"></textarea>
    </div>

    <div style="text-align: center;">
      <button type="submit" class="template-button"
        style="padding: 10px 20px; background: #28a745; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;">
        Submit Suggestion
      </button>
    </div>
  </form>
</div>

```
